name: CameraManager
description: Meta header for CameraManager unit tests

emits.testHint: Assert camera:start emits camera:params with width/height/fps
Assert camera frames are emitted and contain normalized frame meta

acceptance: TREQ-010: camera:start emits camera:params before first camera:frame
TREQ-011: camera frames include width,height,fps and deterministic frameId
TREQ-012: camera.meta header must conform to meta schema and include timestamp
